name: SpeedyBoy Runner
description:
Speedy Boy Runner is subway running boy story game whose name is Speedy Boy. Who running over the town like Milkha singh and Budhia Singh to stole the coin for his princess and one monster whose name is mogembo is running behind him to catch him.

There is so many obstacle in ways of SpeedyBoy and still he is running to save him self from mogembo and try to stole maximum coin. When mogembo can to closer to him he feel like "SpeedyBoy ko pakkada na muskil hi na mumkin he" and when SpeedyBoy fall down and mogembo catch him he "say ye coin humka de de SpeedyBoy".

This very addictive running game like Honey singh song. When start playing this you feel like that you are Speedy Boy of temple and you run long to collect the coin.

So how long you run more coin Speedy Boy collect that will be your score. So, try to get more score to beat your friends score.


Game Features:

- Eye catchy colors and smooth graphics that you love
- One touch control and easy game play
- Extraordinary and energizing diversion musicality
- face the obscure risks and dread
- Tremendous sound effects and rich background music


How to help Speedy Boy to collect maximum point:

- Swap left, right to change the lane
- Swap up to jump
- Drag down to slide.
- Collect maximum coin
- Buy new shoes, jet pack powers up, coin multiplier,

Have fun to play with Speedy Boy. Let's run fast mogembo is coming.
